attributes.action: launch a public enquiry into the extent, causes and implications of student poverty in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the introduction of student fees (forecast to increase signifcantly in the near future) and with students finding it increasingly difficult to find employment during the recession - many are now experiencing real poverty. The effects of this on student well- being are exceedingly serious.
